name: Power Search
author: Priyank Patel

sections.description:
• This plugins allows to search content from post, comment, pages in WordPress admin side.
  • It is helpful when you have large number of posts or pages or comments and you want to search specific word from the content.
  • This plugins contain filter which allows to search content from posts or pages or comments or all.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
sections.changelog:
1.3.1

  • Improvement in Search Result

1.3

  • Added Widgets to Dashboard
  • Search using dashboard widgets

1.2.1

  • Bug fixed

1.2

  • Improvment in code designing
  • Include Comment_author in result
  • Shows search keyword bold in search result

1.1

  • Bug Fixed
  • Searching improved
  • Database security improved

1.0

  • Searching content from the post/ pages/ comments
  • Filter added where you can search content from specific catagoery
  • SQL injection proof
  • XSS proof
  • Initial release
